title: JSON schema for Renovate config files (https://renovatebot.com/)

addLabels.description: Labels to add to Pull Request.

additionalBranchPrefix.description: Additional string value to be appended to branchPrefix.

additionalReviewers.description: Additional reviewers for Pull Requests (in contrast to `reviewers`, this option adds to the existing reviewer list, rather than replacing it).

aliases.description: Aliases for registries, package manager specific.

allowCustomCrateRegistries.description: Configure this to true if custom crate registries are allowed.

allowPlugins.description: Configure this to true if repositories are allowed to run install plugins.

allowPostUpgradeCommandTemplating.description: If true allow templating for post-upgrade commands.

allowScripts.description: Configure this to true if repositories are allowed to run install scripts.

allowedPostUpgradeCommands.description: A list of regular expressions that determine which post-upgrade tasks are allowed.

ansible.description: Configuration object for the ansible manager

ansible-galaxy.description: Configuration object for the ansible-galaxy manager

argocd.description: Configuration object for the argocd manager

assignAutomerge.description: Assign reviewers and assignees even if the PR is to be automerged.

assignees.description: Assignees for Pull Request (either username or email address depending on the platform).

assigneesFromCodeOwners.description: Determine assignees based on configured code owners and changes in PR.

assigneesSampleSize.description: Take a random sample of given size from assignees.

autodiscoverFilter.description: Filter the list of autodiscovered repositories.

automerge.description: Whether to automerge branches/PRs automatically, without human intervention.

automergeComment.description: PR comment to add to trigger automerge. Used only if automergeType=pr-comment.

automergeStrategy.description: The merge strategy to use when automerging PRs. Used only if `automergeType=pr`.

azure-pipelines.description: Configuration object for the azure-pipelines manager

azureAutoApprove.description: If set to true, Azure DevOps PRs will be automatically approved.

azureWorkItemId.description: The id of an existing work item on Azure Boards to link to each PR.

baseBranches.description: An array of one or more custom base branches to be processed. If left empty, the default branch will be chosen.

baseDir.description: The base directory for Renovate to store local files, including repository files and cache. If left empty, Renovate will create its own temporary directory to use.

batect.description: Configuration object for the batect manager

batect-wrapper.description: Configuration object for the batect-wrapper manager

bazel.description: Configuration object for the bazel manager

binarySource.description: Controls whether third-party tools like npm or Gradle are called directly, via Docker sidecar containers, or dynamic install.

bitbucket-pipelines.description: Configuration object for the bitbucket-pipelines manager

branchConcurrentLimit.description: Limit to a maximum of x concurrent branches. 0 means no limit, `null` (default) inherits value from `prConcurrentLimit`.

branchPrefix.description: Prefix to use for all branch names.

buildkite.description: Configuration object for the buildkite manager

bumpVersion.description: Bump the version in the package file being updated.

bundler.description: Configuration object for the bundler manager

cacheDir.description: The directory for Renovate for storing caches. If left empty, Renovate will create a subdirectory within `baseDir` to use.

cake.description: Configuration object for the cake manager

cargo.description: Configuration object for the cargo manager

cdnurl.description: Configuration object for the cdnurl manager

circleci.description: Configuration object for the circleci manager

cloneSubmodules.description: Set to true to enable initialization of submodules during repository clone.

cloudbuild.description: Configuration object for the cloudbuild manager

cocoapods.description: Configuration object for the cocoapods manager

commitBody.description: Commit message body template. Will be appended to commit message, separated by two line returns.

commitBodyTable.description: If enabled, append a table in the commit message body describing all updates in the commit.

commitMessage.description: Message to use for commit messages and pull request titles.

commitMessageAction.description: Action verb to use in commit messages and PR titles.

commitMessageExtra.description: Extra description used after the commit message topic - typically the version.

commitMessagePrefix.description: Prefix to add to start of commit messages and PR titles. Uses a semantic prefix if semanticCommits enabled.

commitMessageSuffix.description: Suffix to add to end of commit messages and PR titles.

commitMessageTopic.description: The upgrade topic/noun used in commit messages and PR titles.

composer.description: Configuration object for the composer manager

composerIgnorePlatformReqs.description: Configure use of `--ignore-platform-reqs`/`--ignore-platform-req` for the Composer package manager.

conan.description: Configuration object for the conan manager

confidential.description: If enabled, issues created by Renovate are set as confidential.

configWarningReuseIssue.description: Set this to false and Renovate will open each config warning in a new issue instead of reopening/reusing an existing issue.

constraints.description: Configuration object to define language or manager version constraints.

customEnvVariables.description: Custom environment variables for child processes and sidecar Docker containers.

deepExtract.description: Enable extraction of dependencies using package managers.

defaultRegistryUrls.description: List of registry URLs to use as the default for a datasource.

dependencyDashboard.description: Whether to create a "Dependency Dashboard" issue within the repository.

dependencyDashboardApproval.description: Whether updates should require manual approval from within the Dependency Dashboard issue before creation.

dependencyDashboardAutoclose.description: Set to `true` and Renovate will autoclose the Dependency Dashboard issue if there are no updates.

dependencyDashboardFooter.description: Any text added here will be placed last in the Dependency Dashboard issue body, with a divider separator before it.

dependencyDashboardHeader.description: Any text added here will be placed first in the Dependency Dashboard issue body.
dependencyDashboardHeader.default: This issue provides visibility into Renovate updates and their statuses. [Learn more](https://docs.renovatebot.com/key-concepts/dashboard/)

dependencyDashboardLabels.description: These labels will always be applied on the Dependency Dashboard issue, even when they have been removed manually.

dependencyDashboardTitle.description: Title to use for the Dependency Dashboard issue.

deps-edn.description: Configuration object for the deps-edn manager

description.description: Plain text description for a config or preset.

detectGlobalManagerConfig.description: If true, Renovate will attempt to read global manager config from the file system.

detectHostRulesFromEnv.description: If true, Renovate tries to detect host rules from environment variables.

digest.description: Configuration to apply when updating a digest (no change in tag/version).

docker-compose.description: Configuration object for the docker-compose manager

dockerChildPrefix.description: Change this value in order to add a prefix to the Renovate Docker sidecar container names and labels.

dockerImagePrefix.description: Change this value in order to override the default Renovate Docker sidecar image name prefix.

dockerUser.description: Specify UID and GID for Docker-based binaries when binarySource=docker is used.

dockerfile.description: Configuration object for the dockerfile manager

draftPR.description: If enabled, the PR created by Renovate is set to a draft.

droneci.description: Configuration object for the droneci manager

dryRun.description: If enabled, perform a dry run by logging messages instead of creating/updating/deleting branches and PRs.

enabledManagers.description: A list of package managers to enable. If defined, then all managers not on the list are disabled.

encrypted.description: A configuration object containing configuration encrypted with project key.

excludeCommitPaths.description: A file that matches any of these glob patterns will not be committed, even if it has been updated.

executionTimeout.description: Default execution timeout in minutes for child processes Renovate creates.

exposeAllEnv.description: Configure this to true to allow passing of all env variables to package managers.

extends.description: Configuration presets to use/extend. Note: does not work if configured in config.js.

extractVersion.description: A regex (re2) to extract a version from a datasource's raw version string.

fetchReleaseNotes.description: Whether or not to fetch release notes.

fileMatch.description: RegEx (re2) pattern for matching manager files.

filterUnavailableUsers.description: Filter reviewers and assignees based on their availability.

flux.description: Configuration object for the flux manager

followTag.description: If defined, packages will follow this release tag exactly.

force.description: Any configuration defined within this object will force override existing settings.

forceCli.description: Whether CLI configuration options should be moved to the `force` config section.

forkMode.description: Set to true to fork the source repository and create branches there instead.

forkToken.description: Will be used on GitHub when `forkMode` is set to `true` to clone the repositories.

fvm.description: Configuration object for the fvm manager

git-submodules.description: Configuration object for the git-submodules manager

gitAuthor.description: Author to use for Git commits. Must conform to RFC5322.

gitIgnoredAuthors.description: Additional git authors which are ignored by Renovate. Must conform to RFC5322.

gitLabIgnoreApprovals.description: Ignore approval rules for MRs created by Renovate, which is useful for automerge.

gitNoVerify.description: Which git commands will be run with the `--no-verify` option.

gitPrivateKey.description: PGP key to use for signing Git commits.

gitUrl.description: Overrides the default resolution for git remote, e.g. to switch GitLab from HTTPS to SSH-based.

github-actions.description: Configuration object for the github-actions manager

gitlabci.description: Configuration object for the gitlabci manager

gitlabci-include.description: Configuration object for the gitlabci-include manager

globalExtends.description: Configuration presets to use/extend for a self-hosted config.

gomod.description: Configuration object for the gomod manager

gradle.description: Configuration object for the gradle manager

gradle-wrapper.description: Configuration object for the gradle-wrapper manager

groupName.description: Human understandable name for the dependency group.

groupSlug.description: Slug to use for group (e.g. in branch name). Will be calculated from `groupName` if `null`.

hashedBranchLength.description: If enabled, branch names will use a hashing function to ensure each branch has that length.

helm-requirements.description: Configuration object for the helm-requirements manager

helm-values.description: Configuration object for the helm-values manager

helmfile.description: Configuration object for the helmfile manager

helmsman.description: Configuration object for the helmsman manager

helmv3.description: Configuration object for the helmv3 manager

homebrew.description: Configuration object for the homebrew manager

abortIgnoreStatusCodes.description: A list of HTTP status codes to ignore and *not* abort the run because of when abortOnError=true.

abortOnError.description: If enabled, Renovate will abort its run when HTTP request errors occur.

authType.description: Authentication type for http header. e.g. "Bearer" or "Basic". Use "Token-Only" to use only the token without an authorization type.

hostType.description: hostType for a package rule. Can be a platform name or a datasource name.

insecureRegistry.description: Explicitly turn on insecure Docker registry access (HTTP).

matchHost.description: A domain name, host name or base URL to match against

timeout.description: Timeout (in milliseconds) for queries to external endpoints.

html.description: Configuration object for the html manager

ignoreDeprecated.description: Ignore deprecated versions unless the current version is deprecated.

ignorePaths.description: Skip any package file whose path matches one of these. Can be a string or glob pattern.

ignorePlugins.description: Configure this to true if allowPlugins=true but you wish to skip running plugins when updating lock files.

ignorePrAuthor.description: Set to true to fetch the entire list of PRs instead of only those authored by the Renovate user.

ignorePresets.description: A list of presets to ignore, including nested ones inside `extends`.

ignoreScripts.description: Configure this to true if allowScripts=true but you wish to skip running scripts when updating lock files.

ignoreTests.description: Set to true to enable automerging without tests.

includeForks.description: Whether to process forked repositories or not. By default, all forked repositories are skipped.

includePaths.description: Include package files only within these defined paths.

internalChecksFilter.description: When/how to filter based on internal checks.

java.description: Configuration object for all Java package managers.

jenkins.description: Configuration object for the jenkins manager

jsonnet-bundler.description: Configuration object for the jsonnet-bundler manager

kubernetes.description: Configuration object for the kubernetes manager

kustomize.description: Configuration object for the kustomize manager

labels.description: Labels to set in Pull Request.

leiningen.description: Configuration object for the leiningen manager

logContext.description: Add a global or per-repo log context to each log entry.

major.description: Configuration to apply when an update type is major.

maven.description: Configuration object for the maven manager

meteor.description: Configuration object for the meteor manager

migratePresets.description: Define presets here which have been removed or renamed and should be migrated automatically.

minor.description: Configuration to apply when an update type is minor.

mix.description: Configuration object for the mix manager

node.description: Configuration object for Node version renovation.

nodenv.description: Configuration object for the nodenv manager

npm.description: Configuration object for the npm manager

npmToken.description: npm token used for authenticating with the default registry.

npmrc.description: String copy of npmrc file. Use \n instead of line breaks.

npmrcMerge.description: Whether to merge config.npmrc with repo .npmrc content if both are found.

nuget.description: Configuration object for the nuget manager

nvm.description: Configuration object for the nvm manager

onboardingBranch.description: Change this value in order to override the default onboarding branch name.

onboardingCommitMessage.description: Change this value in order to override the default onboarding commit message.

onboardingConfig.description: Configuration to use in onboarding PRs.

onboardingConfigFileName.description: Change this value in order to override the default onboarding config file name.

onboardingNoDeps.description: Onboard repository even if no dependencies found.

onboardingPrTitle.description: Change this value in order to override the default onboarding PR title.

optimizeForDisabled.description: Set to true to first check for disabling in config before cloning.

allowedVersions.description: A version range or regex pattern capturing allowed versions for dependencies.

excludePackageNames.description: Package names to exclude. Valid only within `packageRules` object.

excludePackagePatterns.description: Package name patterns to exclude. Valid only within `packageRules` object.

excludePackagePrefixes.description: Package name prefixes to exclude. Valid only within `packageRules` object.

matchBaseBranches.description: List of strings containing exact matches (e.g. `["main"]`) and/or regex expressions (e.g. `["/^release\/.*/"]`). Valid only within `packageRules` object.

matchCurrentVersion.description: A version or version range to match against the current version of a package. Valid only within `packageRules` object.

matchDatasources.description: List of datasources to match (e.g. ["orb"]). Valid only within `packageRules` object.

matchDepTypes.description: List of depTypes to match (e.g. [`peerDependencies`]). Valid only within `packageRules` object.

matchFiles.description: List of strings to do an exact match against package files with full path. Applicable inside packageRules only.

matchLanguages.description: List of languages to match (e.g. ["python"]). Valid only within `packageRules` object.

matchManagers.description: List of package managers to match (e.g. ["pipenv"]). Valid only within `packageRules` object.

matchPackageNames.description: Package names to match. Valid only within `packageRules` object.

matchPackagePatterns.description: Package name patterns to match. Valid only within `packageRules` object.

matchPackagePrefixes.description: Package name prefixes to match. Valid only within `packageRules` object.

matchPaths.description: List of strings or glob patterns to match against package files. Applicable inside packageRules only.

matchSourceUrlPrefixes.description: A list of source URL prefixes to match against, commonly used for grouping of monorepos or packages from the same organization.

matchUpdateTypes.description: Update types to match against (major, minor, pin, etc). Valid only within `packageRules` object.

replacementName.description: The name of the new dependency that replaces the old deprecated dependency.

replacementVersion.description: The version of the new dependency that replaces the old deprecated dependency.

password.description: Password for authentication. Currently Bitbucket only (AppPassword).

patch.description: Configuration to apply when an update type is patch.

persistRepoData.description: If set to true, repository data will preserved between runs instead of deleted.

pin.description: Configuration to apply when an update type is pin.

pinDigests.description: Whether to add digests to Dockerfile source images.

pip-compile.description: Configuration object for the pip-compile manager

pip_requirements.description: Configuration object for the pip_requirements manager

pip_setup.description: Configuration object for the pip_setup manager

pipenv.description: Configuration object for the pipenv manager

platformAutomerge.description: Enable or disable usage of platform-native auto-merge capabilities when available.

platformCommit.description: Use platform API to perform commits instead of using git directly.

poetry.description: Configuration object for the poetry manager

postUpdateOptions.description: Enable post-update options to be run after package/artifact updating.

postUpgradeTasks.description: Post-upgrade tasks that are executed before a commit is made by Renovate.

commands.description: A list of post-upgrade commands that are executed before a commit is made by Renovate.

executionMode.description: Controls whether the post upgrade tasks runs for every update or once per upgrade branch

fileFilters.description: Files that match these glob patterns will be committed if they are present after running a post-upgrade task.

prBodyColumns.description: List of columns to use in PR bodies.

prBodyDefinitions.description: Table column definitions for use in PR tables.

prBodyNotes.description: List of additional notes/templates to be included in the Pull Request bodies.

prBodyTemplate.description: Pull Request body template. Controls which sections are rendered in the body.

prCommitsPerRunLimit.description: Set a maximum number of commits per Renovate run. Default is no limit.

prConcurrentLimit.description: Limit to a maximum of x concurrent branches/PRs. 0 (default) means no limit.

prCreation.description: When to create the PR for a branch.

prFooter.description: Any text added here will be placed last in the PR body, with a divider separator before it.
prFooter.default: This PR has been generated by [Renovate Bot](https://github.com/renovatebot/renovate).

prHeader.description: Any text added here will be placed first in the PR body.

prHourlyLimit.description: Rate limit PRs to maximum x created per hour. 0 (default) means no limit.

prNotPendingHours.description: Timeout in hours for when prCreation=not-pending.

prPriority.description: Set sorting priority for PR creation. PRs with higher priority are created first, negative priority last.

prTitle.description: Pull Request title template (deprecated). Now uses commitMessage.

pre-commit.description: Configuration object for the pre-commit manager

prBodyNotes: Note: The `pre-commit` manager in Renovate is not supported by the `pre-commit` maintainers or community. Please do not report any problems there, instead [create a Discussion in the Renovate repository](https://github.com/renovatebot/renovate/discussions/new) if you have any questions.

printConfig.description: If enabled, log the full resolved config for each repo, including resolved presets.

privateKeyPath.description: Path to the Server-side private key.

privateKeyPathOld.description: Path to the Server-side old private key.

productLinks.description: Links which are embedded within PRs, issues, etc.

pruneStaleBranches.description: Enable or disable pruning of stale branches.

pub.description: Configuration object for the pub manager

pyenv.description: Configuration object for the pyenv manager

rangeStrategy.description: Policy for how to modify/update existing ranges.

rebaseLabel.description: Label to use to request the bot to rebase a PR manually.

rebaseWhen.description: Control when Renovate decides to rebase an existing branch.

recreateClosed.description: Recreate PRs even if same ones were closed previously.

redisUrl.description: If defined, this Redis URL will be used for caching instead of the file system.

regex.description: Configuration object for the regex manager

autoReplaceStringTemplate.description: Optional extractVersion for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

currentValueTemplate.description: Optional currentValue for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

datasourceTemplate.description: Optional datasource for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

depNameTemplate.description: Optional depName for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

depTypeTemplate.description: Optional depType for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

extractVersionTemplate.description: Optional extractVersion for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

lookupNameTemplate.description: Optional lookupName for extracted dependencies, else defaults to depName value. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

matchStrings.description: Regex capture rule to use. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

registryUrlTemplate.description: Optional registry URL for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

versioningTemplate.description: Optional versioning for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

registryUrls.description: List of URLs to try for dependency lookup. Package manager specific.

replacement.description: Configuration to apply when replacing a dependency.

prBodyNotes: This is a special PR that replaces `{{{depNameSanitized}}}` with the community suggested minimal stable replacement version.

repositoryCache.description: Option to do repository extract caching.

requireConfig.description: Set to false if it is optional for repositories to contain a config.

respectLatest.description: Ignore versions newer than npm "latest" version.

reviewers.description: Requested reviewers for Pull Requests (either username or email address depending on the platform).

reviewersFromCodeOwners.description: Determine reviewers based on configured code owners and changes in PR.

reviewersSampleSize.description: Take a random sample of given size from reviewers.

rollback.description: Configuration to apply when rolling back a version.

rollbackPrs.description: Create PRs to roll back versions if the current version is not found in the registry.

ruby-version.description: Configuration object for the ruby-version manager

rust.description: Configuration option for Rust package management.

sbt.description: Configuration object for the sbt manager

schedule.description: Times of day/week to limit branch creation to.

semanticCommitScope.description: Commit scope to use if Semantic Commits are enabled.

semanticCommitType.description: Commit type to use if Semantic Commits is enabled.

semanticCommits.description: Enable Semantic Commit prefixes for commits and PR titles.

separateMajorMinor.description: If set to false, it will upgrade dependencies to latest release only, and not separate major/minor branches.

separateMinorPatch.description: If set to true, it will separate minor and patch updates into separate branches.

separateMultipleMajor.description: If set to true, PRs will be raised separately for each available major upgrade version.

setup-cfg.description: Configuration object for the setup-cfg manager

skipInstalls.description: Skip installing modules/dependencies if lock file updating is possible alone.

stabilityDays.description: Number of days required before a new release is considered to be stabilized.

stopUpdatingLabel.description: Label to use to request the bot to stop updating a PR.

suppressNotifications.description: Options to suppress various types of warnings and other notifications.

swift.description: Configuration object for the swift manager

terraform.description: Configuration object for the terraform manager

terraform-version.description: Configuration object for the terraform-version manager

terragrunt.description: Configuration object for the terragrunt manager

terragrunt-version.description: Configuration object for the terragrunt-version manager

travis.description: Configuration object for the travis manager

updateInternalDeps.description: Whether to update internal dep versions in a monorepo (Lerna or Yarn Workspaces).

updateLockFiles.description: Set to false to disable lock file updating.

updateNotScheduled.description: Whether to update (but not create) branches when not scheduled.

updatePinnedDependencies.description: Whether to update pinned (single version) dependencies or not.

useBaseBranchConfig.description: Whether to read configuration from baseBranches instead of only the default branch

userStrings.description: User-facing strings pertaining to the PR comment that gets posted when a PR is closed.

default.ignoreMajor: As this PR has been closed unmerged, Renovate will ignore this upgrade and you will not receive PRs for *any* future {{{newMajor}}}.x releases. However, if you upgrade to {{{newMajor}}}.x manually then Renovate will reenable minor and patch updates automatically.
default.ignoreDigest: As this PR has been closed unmerged, Renovate will ignore this upgrade and you will not receive PRs for the `{{{depName}}}` `{{{newDigestShort}}}` update again.
default.ignoreOther: As this PR has been closed unmerged, Renovate will now ignore this update ({{{newValue}}}). You will still receive a PR once a newer version is released, so if you wish to permanently ignore this dependency, please add it to the `ignoreDeps` array of your renovate config.

username.description: Username for authentication. Currently Bitbucket only.

versioning.description: Versioning to use for filtering and comparisons.

vulnerabilityAlerts.description: Config to apply when a PR is necessary due to vulnerability of existing package version.

writeDiscoveredRepos.description: Writes discovered repositories to a JSON file and then exit.
